name: Jabbing Dancer

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jabbing Style, Mobility; base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th.

sections.text: Each time you hit with an unarmed strike while using Jabbing Style, you can move 5 feet without provoking an attack of opportunity, as long as you move to a space adjacent to the opponent you hit with the unarmed strike. If you use this feat, you cannot take a 5-foot step during your next turn.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jabbing Style, Mobility
base attack bonus +9, brawler level 5th, or monk level 5th
description: You've learned to bend and shift your body to avoid attacks and reposition yourself advantageously.
